title: Advantages of DBMS
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
Key Benefits:
- **Control Redundancy**: Normalization.
- **Data Integrity**: Constraints (e.g., Age > 0).
- **Concurrent Access**: Locking mechanisms.
- **Backup/Recovery**: Robust tools.

real_world_use_cases.description: Imagine if your balance file was overwritten by two ATMs at once. DBMS prevents this.
